sentences.sContent: What time does the train reach the terminus?
sentences.sContent_eng: What time does the train reach the terminus?
sentences.sCn: 火车什么时间到达终点站?。

sentences.sContent: Trains vomit out crowds of passengers at a terminus.
sentences.sContent_eng: Trains vomit out crowds of passengers at a terminus.
sentences.sCn: 成群的旅客在终点站从列车中挤出来。

sentences.sContent: Casablanca was the terminus of a long rickety railway line .
sentences.sContent_eng: Casablanca was the terminus of a long rickety railway line .
sentences.sCn: 卡莎布兰卡是一长而软弱的铁路线的终点。

remMethod.val: termin(结束)+us → 结束地 → 终点站

trans.tranOther: the station or stop at the end of a railway or bus line
